summary_text: ROAS has decreased, likely due to creative fatigue. Performance varies across different creatives.

insights.title: ROAS Decline
insights.description: ROAS has declined from 11.22 on 2025-01-02 to 6.92 on 2025-03-31

insights.title: Creative Fatigue
insights.description: Creatives such as 'Breathable microfiber that moves with you — limited offer on women sports bras.' have a low ROAS of 1.66 and a CTR of 0.0084.

creative_issues.creative_message: Breathable microfiber that moves with you — limited offer on women sports bras.

insights.title: Creative Performance Variance
insights.description: Top performing creatives such as 'Doctors recommend breathable cotton — meet our men athletic briefs.' have a ROAS of 42.58 and a CTR of 0.0179, while bottom performing creatives have significantly lower ROAS and CTR.

creative_issues.creative_message: Doctors recommend breathable cotton — meet our men athletic briefs.
